mapper.select: select a.company_no , a.company_name , a.owner_name , isnull(a.company_div, '') company_div , isnull(a.nation, '') nation , isnull(b.nation_code, '') nation_code , isnull(a.telephone, '') telephone , (select isnull(sum(license_count), 0) from license where company_no = a.company_no and start_date >= convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 20) and end_date <= convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 20)) as total_licenses , (select count(1) from vw_dashboard_user where company_no = a.company_no and use_yn = 'Y') as total_users , 0 as total_satellite_usage from company as a left outer join nations as b on a.nation = b.nation_iso2 where a.company_name like '%' + #{companyName} + '%';

select a.company_no , a.company_name , a.owner_name , isnull(a.business_no, '') business_no , isnull(a.resident_no, '') resident_no , isnull(a.company_div, '') company_div , isnull(a.business_place, '') business_place , isnull(a.nation, '') nation , isnull(b.nation_code, '') nation_code , isnull(a.telephone, '') telephone from company as a left outer join nations as b on a.nation = b.nation_iso2 where a.company_no = #{companyNo};
